recipe.title: Roast Beef with Scallion-Caper Green Sauce
ingredients: 1 cup coarsely chopped fresh flat-leaf parsley
2 tablespoons drained capers (in brine) plus 2 tablespoons brine
instructions: Put oven rack in middle position and preheat oven to 500°F. Pat roast dry and sprinkle all over with 2 teaspoons salt and 1/2 teaspoon black pepper. Roast, fat side up, in a roasting pan 15 minutes. Reduce oven temperature to 325°F and continue to roast until thermometer inserted into center of meat registers 120°F, 35 to 45 minutes more. Transfer roast to a cutting board and let stand, uncovered, 15 minutes. While roast stands, stir together remaining ingredients, a slightly rounded 1/4 teaspoon black pepper, and a pinch of salt. Thinly slice meat across the grain and serve with sauce.
